DOC.brief_summary: The purpose First-in-Human study evaluate safety tolerability single ascend oral dos GLPG1205 give healthy male subject , compare placebo . Also , safety tolerability multiple ascend oral dos GLPG1205 give healthy male subject daily 14 day compare placebo , evaluate . Furthermore , course study single multiple oral dose administration , amount GLPG1205 present blood urine ( pharmacokinetics ) well receptor occupancy GLPG1205 blood sample ( pharmacodynamics ) characterize compare placebo . Also , potential cytochrome P450 ( CYP ) 3A4 induction repeat dose GLPG1205 explore .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male , age 1850 year BMI 1830 kg/m2 Any condition might interfere procedure test study Drug alcohol abuse Smoking
